ApplyTiwTrial.title: Applying for a Tencent Interactive Whiteboard trial

CreateApplication.document: This example shows you how to create a whiteboard application.
CreateApplication.title: Creating a whiteboard application

CreateOfflineRecord.document: This example shows you how to create an offline recording task.
CreateOfflineRecord.title: Creating an offline recording task

CreateSnapshotTask.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateSnapshotTask
<Common request parameters>

{
    "COS": {
        "TargetDir": "snapshot/",
        "Region": "ap-guangzhou",
        "Bucket": "test-123070000",
        "Domain": "xxx.file.com",
        "Uin": 130001358
    },
    "Whiteboard": {
        "Width": 1280,
        "InitParams": "{\"ratio\":\"16:9\"}",
        "Height": 720
    },
    "RoomId": 12345,
    "SdkAppId": 1400123480,
    "CallbackURL": "http://xx/callback"
}
CreateSnapshotTask.title: Creating a whiteboard snapshot task

CreateTranscode.document: This example shows you how to create a dynamic transcoding task for a PowerPoint file and generate a 960Ã—540 thumbnail.
CreateTranscode.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTranscode
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Url": "https://path/to/document.ppt",
    "ThumbnailResolution": "960x540",
    "SdkAppId": "1400000001"
}
CreateTranscode.title: Creating a PowerPoint dynamic transcoding task

CreateTranscode.document: This example shows you how to create a static transcoding task for a PowerPoint file.
CreateTranscode.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateTranscode
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Url": "https://path/to/document.ppt",
    "IsStaticPPT": "True",
    "SdkAppId": "1400000001"
}
CreateTranscode.title: Creating a PowerPoint static transcoding task

DescribeApplicationInfos.document: This example shows you how to query whiteboard applications.

DescribeApplicationUsage.document: This example shows you how to query daily whiteboard usage.
DescribeApplicationUsage.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeApplicationUsage
<Common request parameters>

{
    "TimeLevel": "DAILY",
    "SubProduct": "sp_tiw_ric",
    "BeginTime": "2019-10-01 00:00:00",
    "SdkAppId": 1400000001,
    "IsWeighted": true,
    "EndTime": "2019-12-31 00:00:00"
}
DescribeApplicationUsage.title: Querying whiteboard usage

DescribeBoardSDKLog.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeBoardSDKLog
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": 1400000001,
    "RoomId": "73394291",
    "UserId": "tic_web",
    "TimeRange": [
        1614519034000,
        1614691834999
    ],
    "Context": "",
    "AggregationInterval": "1h",
    "Query": "",
    "Ascending": true
}
DescribeBoardSDKLog.title: Querying the logs of a whiteboard application

DescribeTIWDailyUsage.document: This example shows you how to query the whiteboard usage within the period from 2021-09-01 to 2021-09-07.
DescribeTIWDailyUsage.title: Querying the whiteboard usage

DescribeTIWRoomDailyUsage.document: This example shows you how to query the daily billable usage by each room of a whiteboard application within the period from 2022-11-24 to 2022-11-25.
DescribeTIWRoomDailyUsage.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeTIWRoomDailyUsage
<Common request parameters>

{
    "SdkAppId": "1400000001",
    "SubProduct": "sp_tiw_board",
    "Limit": "20",
    "StartTime": "2022-11-24",
    "Offset": "0",
    "EndTime": "2022-11-25"
}
DescribeTIWRoomDailyUsage.title: Querying the daily billable usage by each room

ModifyAutoRenewFlag.title: Setting auto-renewal for a Tencent Interactive Whiteboard monthly feature package

ModifyWhiteboardApplicationConfig.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyWhiteboardApplicationConfig
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Configs": [
        {
            "AdminUserId": "abcde",
            "BucketPrefix": "doc",
            "ResultDomain": "xxx",
            "AdminUserSig": "abcde",
            "Callback": "http://www.example.com/callback",
            "BucketName": "test-120000001",
            "SdkAppId": 1400000001,
            "TaskType": "recording",
            "BucketLocation": "ap-guangzhou",
            "CallbackKey": "abcde"
        }
    ],
    "SdkAppId": 1400000001
}
ModifyWhiteboardApplicationConfig.title: Modifying the task-related configurations of a whiteboard application

ModifyWhiteboardBucketConfig.title: Modifying the bucket configurations of a whiteboard application

Host: tiw.tencentcloudapi.com

{

    "RoomId": "1203",
